title: The Jesuites intrigues with the private instructions of that society to their emissaries : the first, translated out of a book privately printed at Paris : the second, lately found in manuscript in a Jesuites closet, after his death : both sent with a letter from a gentleman at Paris to his friend in London.
author: Gentleman at Paris.
notes: Original title for "The Jesuites intrigues" undetermined. Second part of work is a translation of: Monita Secreta Societatis Jesu.
Translated by Henry Compton. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
